heading: About The Company
welcomeHeading: Welcome to Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.

paragraphs: Founded in 1990, Lolin Mechanical Company has grown to become a global OEM supplier for forging and casting.
On average every year, over 400 containers of various forgings/castings will be shipped to Germany, America and Japan.

We have specialized in forgings and castings for more than 30 years. We offer a range of technical services including product analysis, and inspection. Based on a flexible approach, and the extensive data we have accumulated from our expansive knowledge, we strive to solve problems and offer new proposals that accurately and rapidly incorporate your needs.

images.caption: Some of the standards that we meet

paragraphs: We pride ourselves in product knowledge, diverse product lines, and total commitment to customer service and satisfaction.

sections.heading: Business Fields
paragraphs: The range of arenas in which our products are active has expanded steadily since our inception.

Our high-quality products service the industries of construction machinery, agricultural machinery, railway system, heavy duty trucking system, etc. In search of new fields, Lolin Mech will pursue new possibilities.
